name: Mega Worm Hole - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
name_original: Mega Worm Hole - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
description: A fast paced side scrolling game where you have to collect coins and avoid the enemies. A great game that can be controlled with a single input. As with most games, you control your character with spacebar or left mouse button. Based around currently popular side-scrolling action games.
